description: A single extracted table including metadata (CoreDataItem)

hasHeader.description: true if the table contained <th> tags in the original HTML

recordEndOffset.description: End of the originating page in the CommonCrawl.

recordOffset.description: Offset into the CommonCrawl file containing the originating page.

relation.description: Two-dimensional array of string, contains the actual data extracted from the HTML table in column-major format.

s3Link.description: Link to the Common Crawl file containing the originating page.

tableNum.description: Position of this table in the list of tables contained in the original page. I.e., '3' means this table was extracted from the third <table> tag on the page.

termSet.description: The 100 most frequent terms (normalized words) in the original page

title.description: Content of a <caption> tag of the table if it existed

pageTitle.description: Content of a <title> tag of the page the table was extracted from

url.description: URL of the page the table originates from.

headerPosition.description: Original position of the <th> tags in the table, if there were any. Possible values: FIRST_ROW, FIRST_COLUMN, NONE, MIXED

tableType.description: Result of the table type classification. Possible values: RELATION, MATRIX, ENTITY, OTHER.

markup.description: Full HTML markup of the entire <table>.

textBeforeTable.description: Parsed text immediately preceeding the table.

textAfterTable.description: Parsed text immediately following the table.

timestamp.description: Timestamp in ISO 8601 format (without timezone) when the website was crawled.
